name: Savior Planet
description:
A little game of life, death, and the universe.
  1. Drift and jump among the clouds. [space to jump, arrows to move]
  2. Collect life forms [tree, pig, heart] in the right sequence. The flashing light at the top tells you what to collect next. If you mess up, it moves back a step. 
  3. Avoid the red skulls of death.
  4. When you complete a sequence, the skulls will turn blue for 10 seconds. Smash them!
  5. Smash 10 blue skulls to win the game.
  6. That's it.
Notes:

Made with Unity 2020.3.2f1.

Music and sfx made with BeepBox and ChipTone.

Font: Supersonic Rocketship by imagex.
